name: Ima Sugu Onii-chan ni Imouto da tte Iitai!
summary: Ima Sugu Oniichan ni Imōto da tte Iitai!, also known as Imaimo for short, with the tagline "I wanna say that I'm not your brother right now!", is a Japanese visual novel developed by Fairys, a sister brand of Sprite, the creators of Love, Elections & Chocolate.
